message: Hi Bob, I'm offering my product to you for $9,500. I believe it will be highly valuable to you, and this offer represents a fair price for its worth.
I appreciate your time and consideration, Alice. I'm willing to pay $7,500 for the product. I believe it's a fair price considering its worth to you.
Thanks for your offer, Bob. I understand your perspective, but the product's value is considerably higher than that to me. I could consider letting it go for $9,000.
I appreciate your flexibility, Alice. I'm willing to meet you halfway at $8,250. I believe it's a fair price for both of us.
